title: 15 years on, US nuke deal waits for power plug
description: According to the report, India currently has 19 operational reactors with a total generating capacity of 6.3GW (gigawatts) or 6300MW (megawatts). The share of nuclear power in Indiaâ€™s electricity is 3.1 per cent. It says that eight more reactors with a combined capacity of 6.0GW are being constructed.
